constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 106 (Thursday, June 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUDD:
H.R. 3977.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I section I, which includes an implied power for
the Congress to regulate the conduct of the United States
with respect to foreign affairs.
[Page H2929]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Iron Dome Reinforcement Act of 2021
